plan: Initially, I'll test the dominant strategy by bidding 50% of my value for the first few rounds to establish a baseline. Then, I'll experiment with aggressive bidding at 75% of my value to assess the impact on profit and competitor behavior. I'll also try conservative bids at 25% to gauge safety and potential missed opportunities. Midway, I'll adapt based on trends, possibly incorporating random high bids to disrupt patterns. Throughout, I'll track competitors' bidding tendencies to refine my strategy, aiming to maximize long-term profit while balancing risk and reward.

In the upcoming rounds, I will test a mix of strategies. Initially, I'll bid 50% of my value to establish a baseline. Then, I'll explore aggressive bids at 70-80% of my value when my value is above $50, aiming to win more often. For values below $50, I'll test conservative bids at 30-40% to minimize losses. I'll also experiment with occasional random bids to gather data on opponents' strategies. I'll adjust based on observed patterns, focusing on maximizing long-term profit by balancing risk and reward.

I'll also try occasional low bids, 30-40%, to exploit potential overbidding by others.
